OCR_info.question_text: 다음 중 소수점의 위치를 잘못옮긴 것은 어느 것입니까?  ①$ \begin{array}{r}0.6{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,2.1}}\end{array}  \rightarrow$ $ \begin{array}{r}6{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,21}}\end{array} $   ② $ \begin{array}{r}0.05{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,0.072}}\end{array}  \rightarrow  \begin{array}{r}0.05{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,7.2}}\end{array} $   ③ $ \begin{array}{r}0.07{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,0.87}}\end{array}  \rightarrow  \begin{array}{r}7{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,87}}\end{array} $   ④ $ \begin{array}{r}24.5{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,147}}\end{array}  \rightarrow  \begin{array}{r}245{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,147}}\end{array} $   ⑤ $ \begin{array}{r}0.72{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,12.05}}\end{array}  \rightarrow  \begin{array}{r}72{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,1205}}\end{array} $

question_bbox.text: 다음 중 소수점의 위치를 잘못옮긴 것은 어느 것입니까?  ①$ \begin{array}{r}0.6{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,2.1}}\end{array}  \rightarrow$ $ \begin{array}{r}6{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,21}}\end{array} $   ② $ \begin{array}{r}0.05{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,0.072}}\end{array}  \rightarrow  \begin{array}{r}0.05{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,7.2}}\end{array} $   ③ $ \begin{array}{r}0.07{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,0.87}}\end{array}  \rightarrow  \begin{array}{r}7{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,87}}\end{array} $   ④ $ \begin{array}{r}24.5{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,147}}\end{array}  \rightarrow  \begin{array}{r}245{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,147}}\end{array} $   ⑤ $ \begin{array}{r}0.72{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,12.05}}\end{array}  \rightarrow  \begin{array}{r}72{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,1205}}\end{array} $
